questionTitle: When you are riding a bicycle you should ________ the handlebars firmly.
If we are thinking of having a day in the country, I should like to listen to the weather ________.
I bought a single ticket only on the bus, but my friend bought a ________ one.
How much would you ________ for repairing my watch?
They ________ their examinations at the end of the next month.
It took years of research, but ________ they found the answer.
July 10th is my wedding anniversary. Next month, my husband and I will ________ for twenty years.
Tommy had his big brother ________ his shoes for him.
Bill came to work at the University thirty years ________ today.
We can become frustrated by a legal system when judges ________.
Don't worry about trying to catch the last train home, as we can easily ________ you up for the night.
The whole story is made up. It's nothing but a ________ of lies.
Helen is expert ________ drafting the minutes of a meeting.
Football is a subject I know very ________ of.
Her landlord gave her two month's ________ to quit.
The weather was ________ that we didn't go out.
Our plane will arrive ________ Don Muang at noon.
His office is only ________ away.
________ in ill-fitting clothes, he smiled a warm welcome.
The crictic must have detested the play, for the review was not merely ________, it was ________.
